question: A dedicated Web Portal and e-Ganna App for the welfare of sugarcane farmers has been launched by which state Government recently?
explanation: Uttar Pradesh government launched a dedicated web portal and e-Ganna App, a mobile application at a function in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. The move is to provide support to the sugarcane farmers of the state. It was launched by the Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh Yogi Adityanath. The move is in line with Prime Minister Narendra Modi\'s vision to double the farmers\' income.The web portal and e-Ganna App aims to help in eradicating cane mafia and middleman. It will strengthen cane development societies. The Cane supply slip is now expected to be issued to the farmers by sugar mills online.
